commit.message:
re PR target/31364 (secureplt breaks bootstrap)

2007-03-31  Andrew Pinski  <andrew_pinski@playstation.sony.com>

        PR target/31364
        * config/rs6000/rs6000.md (call): Convert to LR hard reg for
        secureplt.
        (call_value): Likewise.

From-SVN: r123390

files.patch:

+	PR target/31364
